heroSubtitle: We inspire and equip young people to discover their potential, build strong character, increase their value, and commit to achieving their goals.
personalGrowthDesc: Discover yourself, build character, and reach your full potential.
valueImpactDesc: Learn to increase your value, contribute to your community, and make a difference.
goalAchievementDesc: Commit to actions that move you forward and help you reach your dreams.

aboutPage.title: About Norrechel
aboutPage.subtitle: Empowering young people to discover their potential and rise to their goals.
aboutPage.mission1: Norrechel is dedicated to helping young people discover their potential, develop their character, raise their value, and commit to actions that move them closer to achieving their goals.
aboutPage.mission2: Through thoughtful articles, guides, and mentorship insights, we aim to inspire growth, self-confidence, and a mindset focused on success.

discover.title: Discover Potential
discover.desc: Encourage young people to identify their strengths and passions.

character.title: Develop Character
character.desc: Provide resources to nurture integrity, resilience, and leadership skills.

value.title: Raise Value
value.desc: Empower our audience to increase their personal and professional value.

goals.title: Commit to Goals
goals.desc: Motivate them to take consistent actions that lead to real achievements.

aboutPage.ctaDesc: We believe every young person has the potential to achieve greatness. Take the first step with us.

aboutSection.title: About Norrechel
aboutSection.text: Norrechel is dedicated to empowering young people to discover their potential, develop strong character, raise their value, and take committed action towards achieving their goals. Our content inspires, motivates, and provides actionable insights for growth and success.
